rts: When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.
When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.
When this creature dies, create three 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.
When a creature with afterlife 1 dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.
When this permanent is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.
